name: RNGenie Corp
description:
Welcome to RNGenie Corp!

You’ll be presented with a series of tickets containing pleas from tabletop RPG players across the multiverse, begging for you to grant them the dice rolls they need! Quickly drop a die onto the ticket to grant the player a roll, and then gain or lose Loyal Customers according to their reaction and try to gain 100 Loyal Customers so that you can reign atop the coveted Office Leaderboard! Good luck!

Controls:

Click and Drag with the mouse

ESC to pause
